name: Roronoa Zoro & Sanji
text: DON!! x1 When Attacking Once Per Turn You may return one of your cost 2 or higher characters to its owner's hand: Set up to one of your Power 7000 or less characters as active.

effect.text: You may return one of your cost 2 or higher characters to its owner's hand: Set up to one of your Power 7000 or less characters as active.
